description: This table contains information about ADT Orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the order record.

columns.name: ACCOMMODATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the accommodation code.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ACCOM_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the accommodation code reason.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_ADMT_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the admitting provider.

columns.name: ADT_ATTEND_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the attending provider.

columns.name: ADM_COND_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the patient condition.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_CONSULT_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the lead consultant.

columns.name: ADT_DX_ID
columns.description: Stores the primary diagnosis.

columns.name: ADT_EXPECT_ADMSN_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the patient is expected to be admitted.

columns.name: ADT_EXPECT_DISCHRG_DATE
columns.description: Stores the date the patient is expected to be discharged.

columns.name: ADT_EXPECT_STAY_LEN
columns.description: Stores the number of days the patient is expected to stay.

columns.name: PAS_HAR_CHNG_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason why the patient's current hospital account is ending, and a new hospital account is beginning. 


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: ADT_LOC_ID
columns.description: Stores the hospital area.

columns.name: ADT_INTERN_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the intern provider.

columns.name: LEVEL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the level of care.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the patient class.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the reason for inserting a patient update event.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_RES_PROV_ID
columns.description: Stores the resident provider.

columns.name: ADT_RESP_LOC_ID
columns.description: Stores the responsible department.

columns.name: ADT_RESP_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the responsible hospital unit.

columns.name: HOSP_SERV_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: ADT_SERV_AREA_ID
columns.description: Stores the service area.

columns.name: ADT_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: Stores the hospital unit.
